titles.title: A joint resolution relating to Central America pursuant to H. J. Res. 395 of the the 100th Congress.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell unfavorably without amendment. With written report No. 100-282.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 526.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54-43. Record Vote No: 17.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 51-48. Record Vote No: 18.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/28/1988--Introduced. Approves the additional authority and assistance for the Nicaraguan resistance that the President requested pursuant to the Act making continuing appropriations for FY 1988.
